issue.title: [C++][Compute] Investigate ChunkedArray sort performance
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10790](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10790). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
From our micro-benchmarks, it seems that sorting a ChunkedArray can be significantly slower than sorting a linear Array of the same size. Perhaps this can be improved.
